verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] making his first visit to the State Department to attend the ceremonial swearing - in of Secretary of State Mike Pompeo .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: making] [ARG1: his first visit to the State Department] [ARGM-PRP: to attend the ceremonial swearing - in of Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is making his first visit to the State Department to [V: attend] [ARG1: the ceremonial swearing - in of Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] .
